proj3 README

Windows
1.Install, or find Python 2.7 for your system (download path https://www.python.org/downloads/windows/)
2.Install the Python for Windows extensions.
(download path https://sourceforge.net/projects/pywin32/files/pywin32/Build%20221/pywin32-221.win32-py2.7.exe/download) 
3.copy env folder to C drive
4.Run these commands using commad promt
  >cd env
  >cd proj3
  C:\env\proj3>..\Scripts\pserve development.ini

5.Application url
  http://localhost:6543/upload
